data.feedback: Well-designed architecture that properly extends existing Flutter foundation. All story file references verified - filesToRead exist, filesToCreate don't. Pattern guidance correctly references existing types (EnvConfig, AppConstants, exceptions). Stories can execute in parallel with zero file conflicts.

issues.description: Epic-level filesToCreate metadata includes already-existing files (pubspec.yaml, analysis_options.yaml, .env.example, app_constants.dart). Story-level files are correct.
issues.impact: Documentation inconsistency only - doesn't affect implementation

suggestions: Update epic filesToCreate to only include truly new files, moving existing files to filesToRead or removing them
